urls.title: Flu News Europe
urls.description: Albania, Estonia, Kazakhstan, Norway and Ukraine reported widespread influenza activity and/or at least medium influenza intensity. 8% of all sentinel primary care specimens from patients presenting with ILI or ARI symptoms tested positive for an influenza virus. Seven countries reported seasonal influenza activity at or above 10% positivity in sentinel primary care: Slovenia (36%), Hungary (34%), France (33%), Israel (31%), Luxembourg (16%), Serbia (13%) and Switzerland (10%).
